subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Ruiz hit a two-out RBI double in the 11th inning and the Phillies overcame another blown save by Brad Lidge, holding off a late-inning rally by the Yankees.
snippet: Carlos Ruiz hit a two-out RBI double in the 11th inning and the Phillies overcame another blown save by Brad Lidge, holding off a late-inning rally by the Yankees.
